title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Linter cleanup: Removed trailing spaces and blank lines in two documentation files (`restricting-access-to-githubcom-using-a-corporate-proxy.md`, `easy-apps-with-spark.md`).
GHES release update: Adjusted dates for version 3.18 in `enterprise-dates.json` (release and release candidate moved to September 2025).

Secret scanning enhancements: Added `ghes: '>=3.19'` to ~50+ secret patterns in `public-docs.yml`, enabling them for GHES 3.19+. Enabled push protection for several patterns (e.g., Algolia, Alibaba keys) and updated config SHAs.

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Linter cleanup: Removed trailing spaces and blank lines in two documentation files (`restricting-access-to-githubcom-using-a-corporate-proxy.md`, `easy-apps-with-spark.md`).
- GHES release update: Adjusted dates for version 3.18 in `enterprise-dates.json` (release and release candidate moved to September 2025).
- Secret scanning enhancements: Added `ghes: '>=3.19'` to ~50+ secret patterns in `public-docs.yml`, enabling them for GHES 3.19+. Enabled push protection for several patterns (e.g., Algolia, Alibaba keys) and updated config SHAs.

### Title
GHES 3.19 secret scanning support, release date updates, and lint fixes
